name: Kirby: Invaders from the Dark
storyline: Kirby's nap is cut short when a massive portal appears in the sky. Two shadowy figures, named Pandora and Molotov, destroy the Staff of Cosmos, the only thing standing in their way. It's up to Kirby to gather the six pieces to recreate teh Staff and defeat Pandora, Molotov and their mysterious leader Metuo...
summary: An unofficial Kirby fangame. Kirby's nap is interrupted by a portal appearing from the sky: he must reassemble the destroyed the Staff of Cosmos to thwart the invasion led by Metuo and his lieutenants Molotov and Pandora.
